name: nextcloud-office
description: Nextcloud Richdocuments integrates Collabora Online to enable collaborative editing of documents, spreadsheets, and presentations directly within a self-hosted Nextcloud environment.

features.title: Document Editing
features.description: Create and edit text documents with formatting, styles, and templates

features.title: Media Library
features.description: Build slideshows with transitions, animations, and multimedia content

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Multiple users can edit documents simultaneously with live cursors and changes

features.title: Comments And Review
features.description: Add comments, suggestions, and track changes for collaborative editing

features.title: Template Library
features.description: Start documents from pre-built templates for common use cases
